name: This-Order
description:
Controls

  • Keyboard + Mouse (Any Version):
    • WASD: Movement of the player
      • W/S : Forward / Backward
      • A/D : Left / Right
    • Mouse: Look around
    • Left-Click: Pick an object
  • Wiimote + Nunchuk (PC only, optional):
    • Nunchuck Joystick: Movement of the player
    • Wiimote: Look around
    • B Button: Pick an object

Description

This-Order is a game about a person who has Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD). The person needs everything in the room to be perfect before the person is finally be able to go out of the house.

If things are not in place soon enough, his mental health can be in danger, deforming reality. Can you help him achieving his goal of going out of the house?

Mechanics

There are a total of three objects that are out of place in the house.Find them and place them in the right spot in order to have the house Obsessively Orderer.

Narrative

This-Order, as a game, will let the player immerse into the story of a person that suffers from OCD and needs to follow its everyday morning ritual in order to be able to exit his/her own house. The mechanics and the visual style chosen will let the player actively imaging another person's perspective, letting him train empathy positively. However, the mental health of the character is in risk the more time the room is disordered. The worse the mental health gets, the worse the deformation of reality is.

The aim of this project is to investigate how the manipulation of empathy using a serious game can raise awareness towards people with Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD). We hope to see a positive change in the attitude towards people who suffer from OCD.

We hope that you find interesting and rewarding the gameplay experience.

Thank you for playing.

Best regards,

This-Order Team
